reviewText: ill be Objective as i can be and put it in a Delicate and non-offensive Manner,for those who are considering purchasing it.if you like to torture or Punish Yourself,its Perfect! if you don't like somebody and really don't want to get them a Gift' but feel you must then this is what you need to Buy. Aside from the Weird Music and lights,graphics and all kind of Crazy S! the DVD would not work in either of my 2 players or my Friends.it stopped,skipped,froze.the Audio and Picture Quality were Horrible.all kind of Problems,but Considering the Content i did Suffer through its probably a blessing! this DVD must have been in the Apocalypse!  i felt like i was in Hell watching it.i returned it to Amazon quicker than you can say "Ricky Rapture!!" its very long,but don't expect a high quality Documentary like you might usually see on Subjects like this though.i thought it was complete Garbage! but the CIA' should buy some copies and use it at Gitmo!  Forget Waterboarding..Force somebody to watch this Electronic root canal!  and they will tell you Everything you want to know in short order.its comparable to 'plan 9 from outer Space or  ZARDOZ...ZARDOZ....LOL!!  i would pay Amazon not to Watch this in Order to Avoid it..just my Opinion and nothing more,im sure somebody likes it but i sure don't  i wish i could cut the 1 star rating in half if i could. HERES THE BEST PART!!!!!!!! After  i  submitted my review Amazon  sent  me an e/mail  saying my Reviewer  Rank was....666,924......Yep!  666!!! 100% True!!
